description: Although it calls itself an osteria, Il Granaio is really a restaurant. It has elegant brick - arched dining rooms occupying a 17C palazzo in the historic centre of Rapolano. On the menu you will find Tuscan specialities such as pici pasta cooked with various sauces, peppery Tuscan beef stew and a selection of fish dishes.
